message: something like omnigraffle. i want to do mockups and user flow. also freehand drawing.
Adobe Ideas is dead simple & free but only really offers finger-painting.
How realistic do you want it to look? I always start with Balsamiq, and there are some great iPad stencils: http://mockupstogo.net/ipad-controls
oh i'm sorry i should have been more clear. i meant a design app thats ON the ipad
